title: Global Content Blocks

fields.label: Image & Frame Left, Text & CTA Right
fields.name: image_frame_block
fields.instructions: Global block: Image & Frame Left with Text & CTA Right that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Frame Image
sub_fields.name: frame_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload frame image

sub_fields.label: Content Image
sub_fields.name: content_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload image or GIF which will sit in between frame

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Block must expand to show all text entered in admin and must NOT cut off text

sub_fields.label: Arrow Illustration
sub_fields.name: arrow_image
sub_fields.instructions: Arrow illustration image / video / GIF – admin will upload as a file

fields.label: Services Accordion
fields.name: services_accordion
fields.instructions: Global Services Accordion block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF

sub_fields.label: Services Accordion
sub_fields.name: services
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the list of services (post type) which will populate the title and page that's linked from the button. Admin will enter the intro text manually.

fields.label: Technologies Slider
fields.name: technologies_slider
fields.instructions: Global Technologies Slider block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Logos
sub_fields.name: logos
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the logos uploaded to the technologies post type

fields.label: Values
fields.name: values_block
fields.instructions: Global Values block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Values
sub_fields.name: values
sub_fields.instructions: For each block admin will upload title & text

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF

fields.label: Showreel
fields.name: showreel
fields.instructions: Global Showreel block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: Button to link to page

fields.label: Stats & Image
fields.name: stats_image
fields.instructions: Global Stats & Image block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Stats
sub_fields.name: stats
sub_fields.instructions: 4 x stats and text – colour underline will be coded, add 4 custom classes for each text from .css

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Block will expand to show all text added in admin – it must not be cut off

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: Button title & page to link to

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF

fields.label: Locations with Image
fields.name: locations_image
fields.instructions: Global Locations with Image block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Countries
sub_fields.name: countries
sub_fields.instructions: For each country, admin will upload office and contact details

sub_fields.label: Offices
sub_fields.name: offices
sub_fields.instructions: Admin can upload 1 or 2 offices per country. If any fields are not added this row will hide.

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF

fields.label: News Carousel
fields.name: news_carousel
fields.instructions: Global News Carousel block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Article Selection
sub_fields.name: article_selection
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether this block will show the most recent news articles, or articles in a certain category, or manually select which articles show

sub_fields.label: News Category
sub_fields.name: category
sub_fields.instructions: Select category to filter articles

sub_fields.label: Manual Articles
sub_fields.name: manual_articles
sub_fields.instructions: Manually select 8 articles to show

fields.label: Newsletter Signup
fields.name: newsletter_signup
fields.instructions: Global Newsletter Signup block that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: HubSpot Form Script
sub_fields.name: hubspot_script
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the HubSpot form embed script
sub_fields.default_value:
<script charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" src="//js-eu1.hsforms.net/forms/embed/v2.js"></script>
<script>
hbspt.forms.create({
  portalId: "143891025",
  formId: "d91d6a70-edc5-4879-a79c-16b6d4e5bb00",
  region: "eu1"
});
</script>

sub_fields.label: Terms Agreement Text
sub_fields.name: terms_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the terms and conditions agreement
sub_fields.default_value: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and consent to receive email updates and newsletters

description: Individual global content blocks that can be selected independently across pages

title: Homepage Content

fields.label: Header Section
fields.name: header_section
fields.instructions: Individual header section for homepage only

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Admin can set which text is underlined and in which colour

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Block must expand to show all text entered in admin and must NOT cut off text

sub_fields.label: Button 1
sub_fields.name: button1
sub_fields.instructions: Admin has full control over title, URL and if it opens in the current or new tab

sub_fields.label: Button 2
sub_fields.name: button2
sub_fields.instructions: Admin has full control over title, URL and if it opens in the current or new tab

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF – will be a file that's uploaded and will play when the user gets to that section

fields.label: Projects Section
fields.name: projects_section
fields.instructions: Individual projects section for homepage - needs completion with missing fields

fields.label: Case Studies Section
fields.name: case_studies_section
fields.instructions: Individual case studies section for homepage

sub_fields.label: Knowledge Hub Link
sub_fields.name: knowledge_hub_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link to the Knowledge hub filtered by Case Studies type

sub_fields.label: Selected Case Studies
sub_fields.name: selected_studies
sub_fields.instructions: Admin will select 2 to show (intro text must be a field in the case study). Fields to show: Client Name, The Challenge, View Project Button with url from the project, Project Gallery

fields.label: Global Content Selection
fields.name: global_content_selection
fields.instructions: Select which global content blocks to display on this page

sub_fields.name: enable_technologies_slider
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Technologies Slider block

sub_fields.label: Enable Values Block
sub_fields.name: enable_values
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Values block

sub_fields.label: Enable Showreel Block
sub_fields.name: enable_showreel
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Showreel block

sub_fields.label: Enable Stats & Image
sub_fields.name: enable_stats_image
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Stats & Image block

sub_fields.label: Enable Locations with Image
sub_fields.name: enable_locations_image
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Locations with Image block

sub_fields.label: Enable News Carousel
sub_fields.name: enable_news_carousel
sub_fields.instructions: Show the News Carousel block

sub_fields.label: Enable Newsletter Signup
sub_fields.name: enable_newsletter_signup
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Newsletter Signup block
